Package veth.vetheon.survival.data

Class Board

java.lang.Object
veth.vetheon.survival.data.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a team based scoreboard for a player

This class also has a map that holds all player scoreboards

    • getBoard

      public static Board getBoard​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get the Board for a specific player
      If no Board is available, a new one will be created
      Parameters:
      player - Player to grab scoreboard for
      Returns:
      Board of player
